name: 约会世界~The dating world
description:
Style of social games, This is a lovely Q version it will help you understand more players.

Open the bag to dress up yourself, Like nice clothes, Hair style, Etc.
If you are from Africa, Tanned skin can be selected for their performance.

Press the enter key, Open the multiplayer online, Select your online way.
Create a server and forwarded to the address of your friends to join in.

Click the input dialog, Fill in the content, And press the enter key to send messages.
Through the virtual world of chat conversation, You won't feel nervous, Fear, Afraid of social atmosphere.
Maybe it will help you heal psychological effects, Such as can't meet communication between people in reality.

To switch the third person and first person view and control mode.
The mouse moves to the object, According to the object name, Understanding of social reality.
Click on the bench, wooden door, Etc., Interaction with the object.
......
